cast.original_title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
cast.overview: A timid magazine photo manager who lives life vicariously through daydreams embarks on a true-life adventure when a negative goes missing.
cast.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

cast.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.
cast.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

details.biography: Born of Russian Jewish descent to Alex and Jana Krigsfeld. Born in Israel, where parents migrated from the torn Anti Semitic former U.S.S.R. now called Russia. They had their first born Ilan, as they were awaiting their Visa into America. In pursuit of a better life they migrated in heavenly populated Russian neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York also known as Brighton Beach and or Coney Island. They both were teenagers when they had him, just barely 18 they came to the United States, and that's where it all began.
details.name: Ilan Krigsfeld
